metadata.title: Groupe V2A — Strategic Investment Advisory & Intermediation
metadata.description: Groupe V2A supports institutional and private investors in their strategic projects: real estate, hospitality, renewable energy, fundraising and diversified assets.

experience.title: 50+ years of experience
experience.description: Over half a century of cumulative expertise in strategic investment advisory.

global.title: 5 continents
global.description: An international network covering all major global strategic markets.

fullService.title: From concept to delivery
fullService.description: End-to-end support at every stage of your investment project.

tailored.title: Tailored guidance
tailored.description: Customized solutions adapted to each investor's objectives and requirements.

hospitality.title: Hospitality & Tourism
hospitality.description: Design and delivery of exceptional hospitality projects.

realEstate.title: Real Estate Development
realEstate.description: Design and delivery of high-value real estate programs.

energy.title: Renewable Energy
energy.description: Research and support for sustainable energy projects.

fundraising.title: Fundraising
fundraising.description: Research and support for your financing needs.

assets.title: Diversified Assets
assets.description: Research and support for strategic asset diversification.

ctaBand.title: Ready to bring your vision to life?
ctaBand.description: Contact us to discuss your investment project.

metadata.title: About — Groupe V2A
metadata.description: Discover the vision, mission and leadership team of Groupe V2A, a strategic investment advisory firm.

vision.text: Groupe V2A positions itself as a key player in the transactional value chain, connecting investors with the most relevant opportunities through a rigorous and selective approach.
vision.mission: Our mission is to create lasting value by identifying, structuring and supporting high-potential investment projects, while ensuring perfect alignment between the interests of all stakeholders.

valere.name: Valère Duchenne
valere.title: Co-founder & CEO
valere.expertise: Expertise in financial structuring and international real estate and hospitality project development.

andrew.name: Andrew Duchenne
andrew.title: Co-founder & COO
andrew.expertise: Specialist in operational management and large-scale project deployment in emerging markets.

angelo.name: Angelo Rapazzini
angelo.title: Co-founder & Chief Strategy Officer
angelo.expertise: Expert in investment strategy and financial intermediation on international markets.

selectivity.title: Selectivity
selectivity.description: We only retain projects that meet our rigorous quality and profitability criteria.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear and honest communication at every stage of the investment process.

alignment.title: Interest alignment
alignment.description: Our recommendations are guided by the common interest of all stakeholders.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: Protecting sensitive information is at the heart of our professional commitment.

metadata.title: Services — Groupe V2A
metadata.description: Discover Groupe V2A's expertise: hospitality, real estate, renewable energy, fundraising and diversified assets.

services.pageSubtitle: Comprehensive support for your strategic investment projects

hospitality.title: Hospitality & Tourism Accommodation
hospitality.description: Groupe V2A designs and delivers exceptional hospitality projects, from architectural design to operational delivery. Our expertise covers all types of accommodation: luxury hotels, resorts, tourism residences and innovative hospitality concepts.

realEstate.title: Real Estate Development
realEstate.description: We develop high-value real estate programs, residential and commercial, in the most promising markets. Our integrated approach ensures control at every stage, from land identification to marketing.

energy.title: Renewable Energy
energy.description: Groupe V2A identifies and supports investors in renewable energy projects: solar, wind, biomass and hydrogen. We structure opportunities and facilitate connections between project developers and qualified investors.

fundraising.title: Fundraising
fundraising.description: We support companies and project developers in their fundraising, identifying the most relevant investors and structuring operations to maximize success.

assets.title: Diversified Assets
assets.description: Groupe V2A advises clients on diversifying their investment portfolios, identifying strategic high-potential assets: commodities, alternative assets and market opportunities.

process.subtitle: A structured 6-step process to ensure your project's success

identification.title: Identification
identification.description: Detection and analysis of the most relevant investment opportunities.

qualification.title: Qualification
qualification.description: Rigorous assessment of each project's viability and potential.

structuring.title: Structuring
structuring.description: Legal, financial and operational project setup.

connection.title: Connection
connection.description: Linking with partners, investors and key stakeholders.

negotiation.title: Negotiation
negotiation.description: Support in discussions and agreement finalization.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: Operational follow-up until full project completion.

metadata.title: Gallery — Groupe V2A
metadata.description: Discover the achievements and projects supported by Groupe V2A.

metadata.description: Contact Groupe V2A to discuss your strategic investment projects.

liability.content: Groupe V2A SAS strives to ensure the accuracy of information published on this website. However, it cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness or timeliness of such information. Accordingly, the user acknowledges using this information at their sole responsibility.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy — Groupe V2A
metadata.description: Privacy and personal data protection policy of Groupe V2A.

privacy.intro: Groupe V2A SAS is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This privacy policy describes the personal data we collect, how we use it and the rights available to you.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.content: We collect personal data that you voluntarily provide through our website's contact form: name, email address, phone number, company name and message content.

purpose.title: Purpose of Processing
purpose.content: The data collected is used exclusively to respond to your contact and information requests. It is never sold, exchanged or rented to third parties.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Your personal data is retained for a maximum of 3 years from your last contact with us, unless a longer legal retention obligation applies.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content:
In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:

- Right of access to your personal data
- Right to rectification of inaccurate data
- Right to erasure of your data
- Right to restriction of processing
- Right to data portability
- Right to object to processing

To exercise these rights, contact us at: contact@v2agroup.com

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: This website uses technical cookies necessary for its proper functioning. No advertising or tracking cookies are used without your explicit consent. You can manage your preferences via the cookie management banner.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.

contact.title: DPO Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding the protection of your personal data, you can contact us at: contact@v2agroup.com

cookies.title: Cookie Management
cookies.description: This website uses cookies to improve your experience. You can choose to accept or reject non-essential cookies.

footer.rights: © 2026 Groupe V2A SAS — All rights reserved
